t: Of the Sons of Korah. A psalm. A song.
He*pn has founded his city on the holy mountain.
The*ln Lord*s loves the gates of Zion more*ld than all the other dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious*pn things are said of you, city*ld of God:
“I*ln will record Rahab and Babylon among*ld those who acknowledge me— Philistia*ln too, and Tyre, along with Cush— and*ld will say, ‘This one was born in Zion.’ ”
Indeed,*ln of Zion it will be said, “This*ld one and that one were born in her, and*ld the Most High himself will establish her.”
The*ln Lord*s will write in the register of the peoples: “This*ld one was born in Zion.”
As*pn they make music they will sing, “All*ld my fountains are in you.”
